definitions: ジャングル (n) jungle
english: Jungle
japanese: [ジャングル]

definitions: ホワイト (n) white,correction fluid, white-out
english: Received "White M-phone"!
japanese: 『[ホワイト]メガホン』を手にいれた！

definitions: 粗粗[あらあら] (adv) roughly
あらあら (int) tsk tsk, oh-oh, huh, what's that?
english: Oh, you're right! Don't you know anything about our son?
japanese: [あらあら]ホントだよ！あんたウチの息子を知らないかい？

definitions: 内[うち] (pn) inside, within,while,among, amongst, between,we, our,my spouse,imperial palace grounds,emperor,I, me
家[うち] (pn) house, home (one's own),(one's) family, (one's) household
english: Oh, you're right! Don't you know anything about our son?
japanese: あらあらホントだよ！あんた[ウチ]の息子を知らないかい？

definitions: 田舎[いなか] (n, adj-no) rural area, countryside, the sticks,hometown
english: It's been close to 10 years since he left for the city, saying that he didn't want to live in the country…
japanese: こんな[イナカ]じゃくらせないとか言い残して都会へいったままもう、かれこれ１０年近く……

definitions: 彼此[あれこれ] (adv) this and that, this or that, one thing or another, this way and that,around, about, round about, roughly, nearly, almost
english: It's been close to 10 years since he left for the city, saying that he didn't want to live in the country…
japanese: こんなイナカじゃくらせないとか言い残して都会へいったままもう、[かれこれ]１０年近く……

definitions: ガールフレンド (n) girl friend, girlfriend
english: I remember he wrote us 6 or 7 years ago saying that he had a girlfriend. Could that have been you?
japanese: そういえば６、７年前に手紙がきて[ガールフレンド]ができましたって書いてあったけど、あんたかい？

definitions: 吃驚[びっくり] (adj-f) to be surprised, to be amazed, to be frightened, to be astonished, to get startled, to jump,surprise (e.g. surprise party)
english: What a shock… I didn't know Zack was from this town.
japanese: ……この村にザックスの家があるなんて知らなかったから[びっくり]しちゃった

definitions: 奴[やつ] (pn) fellow, guy, chap,thing, object,he, she, him, her
八つ[やっつ] (num) eight
english: You know him?
japanese: 知ってる[ヤツ]か？

definitions: 嫉妬[しっと] (n, vs) jealousy, envy
english: (…jealous…envious…)
japanese: （やきもち……[しっと]……）

definitions: 凍てる[いてる] (v1, vi) to freeze, to be frozen over, to congeal
english: Are you…jealous? Hmm?  Hmmm? Are you, CLOUD?
japanese: もしかして……やきもちや[いてる]？ん？　んん？どうなのかな、CLOUDくん？

definitions: 如何にも[いかにも] (adv, int) indeed, really, [object Object]
english: Your face tells me differently.
japanese: [いかにも]知ってるって顔してるぞ

definitions: 謙遜[けんそん] (n, vs, adj-na, adj-no) modesty, humility, being humble
english: Don't be so humble!
japanese: [けんそん]しちゃってぇ！

definitions: 努力[どりょく] (n, vs) effort, exertion, endeavour, endeavor, hard work, striving
english: Hard work pays off, huh.
japanese: [努力]はむくわれるってわけね

definitions: 報う[むくう] (v5u) to reward, to recompense, to repay,to retaliate, to get revenge
english: Hard work pays off, huh.
japanese: 努力は[むくわ]れるってわけね

definitions: 果たして[はたして] (adv) as was expected, just as one thought, sure enough,really, actually, ever
english: Do people really need reactors to live?
japanese: [はたして]、人が生きていくのに魔晄炉が必要なのでしょうか？

definitions: 頬[ほお] (n) cheek (of face)
朴[ほお] (n) Japanese bigleaf magnolia (Magnolia obovata)
english: You want something?
japanese: [ほお]……何か用かい？

definitions: 宿泊[しゅくはく] (n, vs) lodging
english: Need a room?
japanese: [宿泊]したい

definitions: 結果[けっか] (n, vs) result, consequence, outcome, effect,coming to fruition, bearing fruit
english: Shinra built the reactor, without even thinking about the town's safety. And, this is the result.
japanese: 神羅のやつらは、村の安全など考えずに、魔晄炉を建設した。その[結果]が、これさ

definitions: 爪[つめ] (n) nail (e.g. fingernail, toenail), claw, talon, hoof,plectrum, pick,hook, clasp

詰め[つめ] (n-suf) stuffing, packing,end (esp. the foot of a bridge),lowest-ranking guest at tea ceremony,tea master,endgame (esp. in shogi or used figuratively),sweet eel sauce,middle-aged woman,appointment to a particular workplace,using as the sole ground of judgement (judgment),continuing, keep doing for period of time
ツメ (n) to close up (editing mark)
english: It's been a while since the explosion, but you can still find the pieces it left all over town.
japanese: 魔晄炉の爆発事故が起こってからずいぶんたつが、その[つめ]あとはいまだに村のあちこちに残っている

definitions: 未だに[いまだに] (adv) still, even now, until this very day
english: It's been a while since the explosion, but you can still find the pieces it left all over town.
japanese: 魔晄炉の爆発事故が起こってからずいぶんたつが、そのつめあとは[いまだに]村のあちこちに残っている

definitions: 住人[じゅうにん] (n) dweller, inhabitant, resident
english: We voted to outlaw the use of Mako energy and live with nature, ever since the explosion.
japanese: わたしたちゴンガガ村の[住人]は魔晄炉の爆発事故があってからは魔晄エネルギーの利用を止めて自然とともに生きることを選んだの

definitions: 伸ばす[のばす] (v5s, vt) to grow long (e.g. hair, nails),to lengthen, to extend, to stretch,to reach out, to hold out,to straighten, to smooth out,to spread evenly (dough, cream, etc.),to dilute, to thin out,to postpone,to prolong,to strengthen, to develop, to expand
english: Reach for it
japanese: 手を[のばし]てみる

definitions: 聞き覚え[ききおぼえ] (n) learning by ear,memory of having heard something before
english: …But That name sounds familiar…
japanese: しかし……その名前には、[聞き覚え]がある……

definitions: 寄越す[よこす] (v5s, vt) to send, to forward,to hand over (e.g. money)
english: I can't believe he hasn't contacted us in 10 years…! …After all, we're his parents.
japanese: １０年も連絡も[よこさ]んとは……なんちゅう息子じゃ

definitions: 行商[ぎょうしょう] (n, vs, adj-no) monger, peddling
english: I am a traveling salesman, going around the world.
japanese: わたしは、世界を旅する[行商]人。

definitions: 無性に[むしょうに] (adv) excessively, very much
english: Even I get homesick and want to see my family.
japanese: そんなわたしだが、[むしょうに]家族に会いたくなることがある

definitions: 愛する[あいする] (vs-s, vt) to love
english: I have a favor to ask of you. Can you get this letter to my lovely wife?
japanese: そこであなたに、たのみがある。どうかわたしの[愛する]奥さんにこの手紙をとどけてもらいたい

definitions: 届ける[とどける] (v1, vt) to deliver, to forward, to send,to report, to notify, to file notice (to the authorities), to give notice, to register
english: I have a favor to ask of you. Can you get this letter to my lovely wife?
japanese: そこであなたに、たのみがある。どうかわたしの愛する奥さんにこの手紙を[とどけ]てもらいたい

definitions: 目前[もくぜん] (n, adj-no) before one's very eyes, under one's nose, imminence, close at hand
目先[めさき] (n) before one's eyes, under one's nose,immediate (e.g. interests), present, at hand, short-run,foresight, near future,appearance
english: What's going on in a world about to end? Is kindness the first to vanish?
japanese: なんということだ……死が[目前]に迫っているこの世界ではもはや人情もかれはてたか……

definitions: 迫る[せまる] (v5r, vt) to approach, to draw near, to be imminent,to press (someone for something), to urge, to compel
english: What's going on in a world about to end? Is kindness the first to vanish?
japanese: なんということだ……死が目前に[迫っ]ているこの世界ではもはや人情もかれはてたか……

definitions: 果てる[はてる] (v1, aux-v) to end, to be finished, to be exhausted,to die, to perish,to do utterly, to do completely
english: What's going on in a world about to end? Is kindness the first to vanish?
japanese: なんということだ……死が目前に迫っているこの世界ではもはや人情もかれ[はて]たか……

definitions: 仕組む[しくむ] (v5m, vt) to devise, to arrange, to plan, to plot
english: Planet structure? …Who cares about that?
japanese: 星の[しくみ]？……どうでもいいわ、そんなこと

definitions: 小難しい[こむずかしい] (adj-i) slightly difficult, somewhat bothersome, troublesome, peevish, querulous
english: Why don't you go ask Bugenhagen of Cosmo Canyon hard questions like that?
japanese: そういう[こむずかしい]事はコスモキャニオンのブーゲンハーゲンという人に聞けば？

definitions: コスモ (n) cosmos
english: Why don't you go ask Bugenhagen of Cosmo Canyon hard questions like that?
japanese: そういうこむずかしい事は[コスモ]キャニオンのブーゲンハーゲンという人に聞けば？

definitions: キャニオン (n) canyon
english: Why don't you go ask Bugenhagen of Cosmo Canyon hard questions like that?
japanese: そういうこむずかしい事はコスモ[キャニオン]のブーゲンハーゲンという人に聞けば？

definitions: 迷う[まよう] (v5u, vi) to lose one's way,to waver, to hesitate, to be of two minds over, to be puzzled, to be perplexed,to give into temptation, to lose control of oneself,to turn in one's grave
english: You lost? When that happens the only ones you can count on are your friends.
japanese: 道に[まよっ]たのじゃな？そういう時に一番たよりになるのは友、じゃよ

definitions: 友[とも] (n) friend, companion, comrade, pal
english: You lost? When that happens the only ones you can count on are your friends.
japanese: 道にまよったのじゃな？そういう時に一番たよりになるのは[友]、じゃよ

definitions: 先決[せんけつ] (n, vs) deciding first, settling (a matter) first, first priority
english: The first thing you gotta do is find your best friend.
japanese: もっとも大切な友を探すこと。それが[先決]じゃて

definitions: 並ぶ[ならぶ] (v5b, vi) to line up, to stand in a line,to rival, to match, to equal
english: This reactor's useless, but I hear there's still Huge Materia at the Corel, Fort Condor, and the Junon reactors.
japanese: ここの魔晄炉はもう使い物に[ならん]が【コレル】、【コンドルフォート】、【ジュノン】の魔晄炉の中には、大きなマテリアが残っているそうじゃ

definitions: 初戦[しょせん] (n) first match (in a series)
所詮[しょせん] (adv) after all
緒戦[しょせん] (n) beginning of hostilities, beginning of competition
english: Shinra's tried a lot of things, but it's only HUMAN. It's fate that Meteor will kill the people.
japanese: 神羅もいろんな手をつくしたが[しょせん]、ちっぽけな人間のやること。メテオによって人が滅びるのは運命なのじゃよ

definitions: 若者[わかもの] (n, adj-no) young man, young woman, young people, youth, youngsters
english: Tell me, young man.
japanese: おしえてくれ、[若者]よ

definitions: 知らせる[しらせる] (v1, vt) to notify, to advise, to inform
english: …You'd think someone told the Shinra about us?
japanese: ……だれかが、オイラたちのことを神羅に[知らせ]ているのかな

definitions: 赤い[あかい] (adj-i) red, crimson, scarlet, vermilion, vermillion,Red, communist,beautiful
english: What are you getting so embarrassed about? Come on? Who do you like?
japanese: なに[赤く]なってるのかな、と。ん？　誰がいいのかな？

definitions: 出番[でばん] (n) one's turn, one's shift,one's turn on stage, screen time, screentime
english: Hmm… Then it's time…
japanese: そうか……[出番]だな、と

definitions: 息む[いきむ] (v5m, vi) to strain (one's stomach), to bear down (during childbirth), to push down
english: Then, we're counting on you. I'll report to Tseng!
japanese: じゃ、先輩たち。あとはよろしくおねがいします。私はツォンさんに報告に[いきま]～す！

definitions: 借り[かり] (n) borrowing, debt, loan
english: Payback time for what you did in Sector 7.
japanese: ７番街の[借り]を返すぞ、と

definitions: 嫌い[きらい] (n) disliked, hated, disagreeable,tendency, smack (of), touch (of),distinction, discrimination
嫌い[ぎらい] (n-suf) dislike, hatred, fear
english: I don't like being taken for a fool.
japanese: なめられるのは[嫌い]だな、と

definitions: 気に入る[きにいる] (exp, v5r) to like, to be pleased with, to be delighted with, to take a liking to, to suit one's fancy
english: I don't like it. How'd they find out where we were?
japanese: [気にいら]ねえぜ。どうしてオレたちの居場所がわかったんだ？

definitions: 居場所[いばしょ] (n) whereabouts, place, location,place where one belongs, where one fits in, place where one can be oneself
english: I don't like it. How'd they find out where we were?
japanese: 気にいらねえぜ。どうしてオレたちの[居場所]がわかったんだ？

definitions: 明らか[あきらか] (adj-na, n) obvious, evident, clear, plain
english: Interesting… They were definitely waiting for us.
japanese: 興味深い……やつらは[あきらか]にまちぶせしていたようだが

definitions: 感じる[かんじる] (v1) to feel, to sense, to experience
観じる[かんじる] (v1) to view, to contemplate
english: I don't like this! It's like the whole world knows where we're going.
japanese: なんかイヤな[かんじ]！アタシたちの行き先ってバレバレみたいだよ

definitions: 何故[なぜ] (adv) why, how
english: How did they know that we were here?
japanese: [何故]、わたしたちがここにいることがわかったのだ……

definitions: 尾行[びこう] (n, vs) shadow, tail, following
english: They followed us… But there weren't any signs of it. Then, that means…
japanese: [尾行]されたか……いや、そんな気配はなかった。ということは……

definitions: 気配[けはい] (n) indication, sign, hint, presence, trend,quotation (esp. stock market)
english: They followed us… But there weren't any signs of it. Then, that means…
japanese: 尾行されたか……いや、そんな[気配]はなかった。ということは……

definitions: 内通[ないつう] (n, vs) secret understanding, collusion
english: …someone's been informing them.
japanese: ……だれかが[内通]しているのか

definitions: 疑う[うたがう] (v5u, vt) to doubt, to distrust, to be suspicious of, to suspect
english: I hate this. Now everyone's gonna blame me because I'm new.
japanese: たまらんなぁ～。そんなん、新入りのボクが[うたがわ]れるんに決まってますやん

definitions: 手先[てさき] (n) fingers, fingertips,underling, stooge, tool, pawn, minion
english: It means there's a Shinra spy…
japanese: 神羅の[手先]がいる……ということか？

definitions: 先回り[さきまわり] (n, vs) going on ahead, forestalling, anticipating, arrival before another
english: Man, looks like they've taken a short cut.
japanese: 気にくわねぇな。[先回り]されてるみてぇだ

definitions: 金儲け[かねもうけ] (n, vs) money-making
english: The Shinra build reactors to make money. And this is what happens.
japanese: 神羅のやつらは、[金もうけ]のために魔晄炉をつくる。そして、その結果がこれだ

definitions: 横暴[おうぼう] (adj-na, n) violence, oppression, high-handedness, tyranny, despotism
english: You saw that village. It's always the powerless that suffer from tyrants like Shinra.
japanese: 見ただろう、あの村を。神羅の[横暴]でよ、被害にあうのはいつでも力を持たない人間だぜ

definitions: 結成[けっせい] (n, vs) formation, combination
english: But I can't let 'em do that. That's why I formed AVALANCHE to fight 'em.
japanese: オレは、そんなことは許せねぇ。『アバランチ』を[結成]して神羅カンパニーと戦ってるのもそんな世界を変えてえからだ

definitions: 失格[しっかく] (n, vs) disqualification, elimination, incapacity (legal)
english: This reactor's a failure.
japanese: ここの魔晄炉は[失格]ねえ

definitions: 存じる[ぞんじる] (v1) to think, feel, consider, know, etc.
english: …No I haven't seen it. I'll get on it right away.
japanese: ……[存じ]ません。さっそく調査します

definitions: 上司[じょうし] (n) (one's) superior, (one's) boss, the higher-ups
english: Oh…sorry! I forgot Heidegger was your boss! Ha ha ha!
japanese: あら、ごめんなさい！ハイデッカーはあなたの[上司]だったわね！キャハハハハ！

definitions: 始める[はじめる] (aux-v, v1) to start, to begin, to commence, to initiate, to originate,to open (e.g. a store), to start up, to establish (business. etc.),to start ..., to begin to ...
english: Just what are the Shinra up to?
japanese: 神羅め、今度は何を[始める]つもりなんだ……
